trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件发生之前关闭窗体，可由用户通过用户界面 (UI)，或以编程方式，通过对方法的调用如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类。

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体上有任何子或附属窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>也会为每个引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If any one of the forms cancels the event, none of the forms are closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体的任何一个取消事件，无窗体，将关闭。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are not sent to any of the forms.
trans-unit.target: 因此，相应<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件不会发送到任何窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> class provides data for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>类为此事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Two important members are the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 两个重要成员<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to true.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置取消事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性为 true。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides a reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>属性提供关闭窗体的原因的原因。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> value that represents the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> 值，表示关闭窗体的原因。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 要取消事件时为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` and `cancel` parameters are used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `closeReason`和`cancel`参数用于初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示关闭窗体的原因。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>可以由于各种原因，用户启动和编程已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates a reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>属性指示闭包的原因。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
